subject: Football
Traffic and Parking Violations
Marijuana
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Mike Maccagnan, general manager for the Jets, said “a level of trust” was damaged when Richardson failed to tell the team about his July 14 arrest.
snippet: Mike Maccagnan, general manager for the Jets, said “a level of trust” was damaged when Richardson failed to tell the team about his July 14 arrest.
